Changelog:
📢 Important Update:
If you're using any version below 7.0, please uninstall it first 🗑️, then install the latest version ⬇️.

Fixed a couple of bugs, including voice typing errors in the free version and snippets/abbreviations not triggering when typing mode is off.
Made the Word Manager more responsive, added an occasional trial feature for free users, and implemented several improvements.
